backend/main.mo: Defines the game canister with room management, player handling including new role field, chatting, and game phase transitions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration logic that upgrades stored room/player data by adding an empty role field to each player.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing required updates for frontend/backend type bindings to support the new player role field.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high-level summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML file mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component routing between game screens based on session and backend phase state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useCreateRoom: React Query mutation hook to create a new room and update session state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useJoinRoom.t: Mutation hook for joining rooms with error handling for invalid or full rooms.
Polling query hook that fetches and returns the latest backend room state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useSendMessag: Mutation hook for sending chat messages and invalidating room state cache.
Mutation hook for starting the game and handling host-only or player-count errors.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/AppHea: Header component showing title, optional subtitle, username, and room code badge.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatCo: Chat input form with validation and submit handling for sending messages.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatMe: Scrollable message list that formats timestamps and visually distinguishes the sender.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ErrorB: Displays a styled destructive alert with a title and message.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/Screen: Provides a page layout with gradient background and a footer including a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/playerId: Generates a unique player ID and stores/retrieves it from localStorage.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/useLocal: React hook that generates and manages a local username through session state.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/username: Generates adjective-animal-number usernames and validates their format.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GameChatS: Chat screen showing role instructions, messages, and a composer for sending chat.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GuessingS: Displays guessing-phase UI with different alerts for anchor vs non-anchor players.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/HomeScree: Home screen enabling username generation, room creation, and joining via room code.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/LobbyScre: Lobby screen showing players, host controls, and start-game validation.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/ResultsSc: Results screen listing the anchor, weird players, and noting missing scoring features.
frontend/src/echoshift/state/session.ts: Zustand store managing player/session data with persistence for ID and username.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, goals, architecture notes, and implemented features for the EchoShift MVP.
